explanation: [0-0] A man in black holds a golden chocolate coin with the Chinese character "福" (meaning fortune) on it, the background being his mouth.
[0-2] The man in black opens his mouth, revealing his teeth, then puts the chocolate coin in his mouth and bites it.
[0-2] The man in black opens his mouth, revealing his teeth, then puts the chocolate coin in his mouth and bites it.

[2-7] Suddenly, the golden wrapper of the chocolate coin the man in black is biting disappears, and then he swallows the chocolate and starts chewing. Finally, the screen switches back to the scene of the man in black holding the chocolate coin.
